title: Forget Warlords Bloodlust on Yasuo for a minute
body:
At 10 stacks at level 18, Fervor of Battle grants 84 physical damage onhit.

{{champion:11}} **is aroused**

Seriously, even early game this is terrifying. He stacks up on Scuttle before walking into lane with 30-40 onhit damage from masteries alone.

On a side note, the numbers ingame do not match those on the masteries screen.
 The client says that each stack grants 3-8 damage based on level, in game it goes up to 8.4 damage per stack.

replies.body:
It's not as much as it sounds, trust me. You can't go Scuttle then a lane since the stacks fall of relatively quickly. Is it good? Yes. It's especially good since on-hit Hybrid Yi is now a thing.

They say they never want to make hybrid champs again, then they make Rageblade broken as hell on Devourer champs. GG Rito. GG.
